Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects.name: Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects
Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects.description: The Outcomes Aligned to Tool Objects Brightspace Data Set provides details of which outcomes are aligned to which assessment tools for all your org units. It includes a row for every outcome aligned to an assessment activity, for both direct alignments and alignments references via rubrics. The data set only captures data from June 2021 onwards.

columns.name: ObjectType
columns.description: Type of tool this outcome is aligned to. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: ObjectId
columns.description: ID of the tool this outcome is aligned to. See Tool-Specific Object Lookup for details.

columns.name: OutcomeId
columns.description: ID of this Outcome in the Outcome Details data set.

columns.name: RegistryId
columns.description: ID of registry representing the context in which this alignment exists.

columns.name: CreatedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was initially created (UTC). Field can be null.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: ID of user who initially created this item. Field can be null.

columns.name: LastModifiedDate
columns.description: Date when this item was last modified (UTC). Contains created date upon creation and deleted date for deleted items.

columns.name: LastModifiedBy
columns.description: ID of user who last modified, created, or deleted this item.

columns.name: IsDeleted
columns.description: Indicates if this item has been deleted.
